snippet.title: MANDRAGRA SEEKER in the CREEPZONE - Official PV
snippet.description:
『MANDRAGRA SEEKER in the CREEPZONE』is available on STOVE!
https://store.onstove.com/en/games/4679

A peculiar adventure of a cowardly gravedigger aiming for the Mandragora Championship gold!
Born into a family of gravediggers, our protagonist is an absolute scaredy-cat.

Though he faints at the sight of ghosts, prompted by a mysterious girl,
he strives to earn his mother's approval by winning gold at the Mandragora Championship.

Collect and breed Mandragoras that change with the climate and moon phases,
while avoiding ghosts and will-o'-wisps on your way to victory!

#CreepZone #mandragora #indiegame #farming #simulator #simulatorgames #survivalgame #christmas #onsalenow
